original: 晉代女方士、神仙。相傳師事蘭公，而後傳道許遜、吳猛，許遜被後世道教淨明道、閭山派尊奉為祖師。諶姆或為茅山宗初代太師魏華存。
text: Female alchemists and gods in the Jin Dynasty. According to legend, Lan Gong was his teacher, and Xu Xun and Wu Meng were preached. Xu Xun was revered as the ancestor of Taoism Jingmingdao and Lushan School. Chen Mu may be Wei Huacun, the first Taishi of Maoshan School.
